Barossa Weintal Hotel Only an hour's drive from Adelaide, the Barossa Weintal is located in the small township of Tanunda, close to restaurants, wineries and boutique shops. Rooms and suites are equipped with modern facilities ensuring a comfortable stay. While in the Barossa, visit award winning wineries, Maggie Beer's Farm Shop or hike one of the many walking trails.
